name: Tank Fort
description:
Based on generic 2D tank games and Ultimate Chicken Horse!

  • Build phase, place down obstacles that can damage or destroy you or your opponent’s tanks, or aid you
  • Possible default map hazards and/or obstacles
  • Battle phase, tanks are dropped into field and put to the fight against each other, with obstacles affecting the game
  • Winner will be awarded points, and other points will be awarded for certain achievements
  • Placed obstacles will carry over through the rounds
  • When a player reaches the points goal, they win.
  • Note: Multiplayer is not fully functional
